section.name: Cayenne FAQ
section.p:
This is a list of Cayenne Frequently Asked Questions. If you have a question not answered here, feel free to ask it on cayenne-user mailing list.
FAQ 1. General
Q 1.1 Where do I get help with Cayenne?
Q 1.2 How do I report a bug that I found in Cayenne?
Q 1.3 How does Cayenne compare to XYZ O/R tool?
Q 1.4 What License covers Cayenne source?
FAQ 2. Installation
Q 2.1 I installed Cayenne in $JRE_HOME/lib/ext and now I am getting strange errors. What's wrong?
FAQ 3. Develop with Cayenne
Q 3.1 What databases are currently supported?
Q 3.2 When I start my application, Cayenne immediately connects to the database. How about lazy connection that happens on the first database call?
Q 3.3 I am getting exceptions similar to 'Error generating PK' or 'No suitable DataNode to handle entity 'XYZ'.
Q 3.4 I reverse-engineered my Oracle database. Why is that all FLOAT columns are not showing properly?
Q 3.5 How do I log an output of a single query?
FAQ 4. Cayenne Design
Q 4.1 Why do application objects have to extend 'CayenneDataObject?'? What about an arbitrary Java class persistence?
FAQ 5. Deploy Cayenne Applications
Q 5.1 When my application is idle for a long period of time, I get "connection was lost" or similar errors?
